Articles.Content: Armed military drones with thermal cameras, from my nation, will keep watch over the next launch. If any militants are spotted the drones will quickly take them out. Currently 12 are being prepared for SSM-7 launch.
Our ships will be keeping watch for,missiles,to knock them out before they can reach the orbiter.

With the high level of protection- the SSM program feels that it's safer than ever, that is if the flight itself is successful. SSM-7 will deploy a military recon satalite. This satalite is for reconassiance of other hostile nations and their movements.
Hey zoo, think you could film the next launch?

Hey zoo, think you could film the next launch?

Not a chance. My computer can't handle OBS or FRAPS or any recording software, with or without KSP. Lags like hell- I mean I could, but the launch may take 2-3 hours and 200 gigs of memory. Maybe 2 years to upload to YT... Basically not happening.
Then, I guess you just need a newer computer, right?

Then, I guess you just need a newer computer, right?

For one. I'd love to be able to .
Yeah. for me, my pref is to use a laptop for the ability to move around

Yeah. for me, my pref is to use a laptop for the ability to move around

If I could get what want, I'd have 2 laptops and 1 desktop. The desktop being EXTREMELY powerful. The 1st laptop being a mobile gaming laptop. And the last for work, and such. Clean, but it could be ages old. An old Windows XP.
Hey, if you want, we can launch a recon sat to watch the launchsite for out of the ordinary activity?

Hey, if you want, we can launch a recon sat to watch the launchsite for out of the ordinary activity?

You could build us a probe to do so, that would be appreciated. The shuttle program must continue!
Will do...just as soon as I get my computer back and install this beautification pack (not the one that broke my game the first time)
Hey, your crews ready for the next launch?

Hey, your crews ready for the next launch?

Indeed they are. Launch set for 4:30pm again. Launching a military sat so coverage will be light.
How was the launch?

How was the launch?

Excellent as was the deployment. We apologize for the lack of info there- classified mission. The next mission is a high quality ultra-violet and inferred light from deep space detector satellite. Slightly more crucial mission as not only is the payload delicate, require a manned operation of activation of the vehicle (onboard power units (RTGs)) as well as make sure the mission is as perfect as possible, as failure will see the nuclear power source return, and we want to make sure it returns intact.
Understandable! Ok, we are still working on our next payload for you, but it's slow progress

Understandable! Ok, we are still working on our next payload for you, but it's slow progress

Take your time. No rush from us .

ok- I want everyone else to tell me- what mods should I pick up? I'm thinking of adding KAS/KIS to add extra functionality to EVA operations (as some of us know, EVAs where pretty much the only way to get any work done in space aside from just deploying stuff). I think it would make the stories way more fun for me and you. Thoughts ?
I was considering using raidernick's IUS from the US Probes pack, if you want to look into that one

I was considering using raidernick's IUS from the US Probes pack, if you want to look into that one

I'm looking for more long term mods- not just single mission ones. Something like RT or life support, etc etc.
ok, though, it could be useful for future missions as well (so I won't have to design an oversized IUS from scratch everytime!)

ok, though, it could be useful for future missions as well (so I won't have to design an oversized IUS from scratch everytime!)

I'll keep it in mind then .
Tell you what. Let's run a trial using the IUS from raidernick and if you like it, we can continue using it.

Tell you what. Let's run a trial using the IUS from raidernick and if you like it, we can continue using it.

Alright, link?
